subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Third baseman Casey Blake avoided arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $6.1 million contract with the Cleveland Indians. Blake, who can become a free agent after this season, hit .270 with 18 home runs last season.
snippet: Third baseman Casey Blake avoided arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $6.1 million contract with the Cleveland Indians. Blake, who can become a free agent after this season, hit .270 with 18 home runs last season.
